overview: Paolo, a young university student, finds himself catapulted into a world of work prematurely cynical and ruthless, in which the "competence" is insignificant compared with the "ownership". Realizing early on their skin, the difficulty of asserting himself relying only on the merits, the boy will face trade-offs ever imagined, discovering an underwater world of male prostitution, which he had not suspected. But a chance encounter would change his life.
tagline: This lower world is an old courtesan that never ceases to have young lovers
title: A chi appartieni
